name: First Person Giant Monster Game
description:
First Person Giant Monster Game is a game I made in 3 days using Unreal Engine 4's Blueprint system as part of Ludum Dare 33 (#LDJAM) where the theme was "You are the Monster".

For the fellow devs who took part in Ludum Dare 33, don't forget to leave a rating on there too :) (http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=preview&uid=21201)

Instructions

Score as many points as possible by killing humans and destroying rocks

Controls

WASD keys - move
Mouse - Aim
Left Mouse Button - Shoot
ESC - Open up pause menu in game

Xbox controllers are supposedly supported

Tools Used:

Engine: Unreal Engine 4

Most of the external assets in the game (models, textures, sounds etc.) are obtained from the optional starter content that comes with every new Unreal Engine project as well as from Mixamo.
